definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: give suck (Ar. gyl give suck (while pregnant); cf. Aram. ga0la foetus, sucking child; 9uwlo0 foal, so Eth. 9iylo0 Talm. [[עִילָה]]);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. fpl. [[עָלוֹת]] giving suck, of cows 1Sa 6:7, 1Sa 6:10; ewes Ps 78:71 and (fig. of returning exiles) Is 40:11; of both Ge 33:13 (J).
